name: Anime Supreme Battle
description:
The Battle Begins Here!

Anime Supreme Battle is a JUS styled MUGEN developed by Mugen_Master335, the creator of Anime Battle Stars. Updates are not as heavy as its heavily updated counterpart. The full experience consists of JUS styled characters from different anime and games coming into one to battle each other.

- NOTICE!!!

This version is a Beta Launch! as such there might be cases of bugs or glitches. If encountering these issues please report them at nightmaremaou33@gmail.com.

- THANK YOU FOR DOWNLOADING!!!

Thank you for downloading and playing our Beta build of the game! If willing to support us more follow our new Twitter for Anime Battle Stars and Anime Supreme battle and Download Anime Battle Stars!

Twitter - https://twitter.com/ABS_DevOfficial

Anime Battle Star's Main Page - https://mugen-master335.itch.io/animebattlestars
